text: U stvorenni neba ta zemli, zmina nochi ta dnya, korabel聞 shcho mandruvannya okean na blaho lyudey, vodnyy shcho BOH posylaye vnyz z neba vidnovyty mertvu zemlyu ta shchob rozpovsyudytysya u tse vsi riznovydy stvorin聞, manipulyuvannya vitru, ta khmary shcho rozmishchuyut聞sya mizh nebom ta zemleyu, ye dostatni dokazy dlya lyudey shcho rozumiyut聞
